en.title: Electronics Repair Shop Management | PraticOS
en.description: Organize your electronics repair shop with a complete work order system. Control quotes, intake photos, abandonment terms and imported parts management. Perfect for TV, audio and monitor repair.
en.keywords: electronics repair software, TV repair shop management, electronics service app, repair shop software, work order system electronics
en.ogDescription: Organize your electronics repair shop. Control quotes, intake photos, abandonment terms and imported parts management.

hero.title: End abandoned equipment:
hero.subtitle: Mandatory intake photo, automatic abandonment terms and imported parts tracking. Digital quotes with automatic follow-up to close more services.

problems.title: Do you face
problems.subtitle: Common pain points for electronics repair shops

items.title: Imported parts take forever
items.text: Ordered the part but don't remember when it arrives. Customer asks and you have no info to give.

items.title: Lost quotes
items.text: Made the quote on paper or WhatsApp, customer disappears and you lose the sale. No organized follow-up.

items.title: Abandoned equipment
items.text: TVs and equipment piling up in the shop for months. Customer doesn't pick up and you can't dispose of it.

items.title: No intake photo
items.text: Customer returns complaining about a scratch that already existed. Without a photo, you can't prove it.

items.title: Warranty disputes
items.text: Customer says the problem returned, but you didn't document what was done. End up redoing it for free.

items.title: Inconsistent pricing
items.text: Charge different prices for the same service. Without a price table, you end up losing money.

solutions.title: How
solutions.subtitle: Features designed for electronics repair shops

items.title: Parts control
items.text: Register imported parts orders with tracking.
items.highlight: Know exactly when each part arrives.

items.title: Quotes with follow-up
items.text: Send digital quotes and track them. System alerts when customer hasn't responded.

items.title: Automatic abandonment term
items.text: After configurable deadline, system generates abandonment term. Legal documentation for disposal.

items.title: Mandatory intake photo
items.text: Configure photo as requirement. Documents cosmetic condition and received accessories.

items.title: Complete history
items.text: Everything documented: defect, diagnosis, parts, photos. Full protection in case of complaint.

items.title: Service catalog
items.text: Price table by service type. Consistent pricing and automatic margin calculation.

checklist.title: Equipment
checklist.text: Document everything at intake and avoid problems. Cosmetic condition, accessories and customer-reported defect.

items.text: Equipment photos (front, back, sides)
Serial number and model
Cosmetic condition: scratches, dents, stains
Customer-reported defect
Received accessories (remote, cables)
Customer digital signature

items.title: Mandatory intake photo
items.text: Configure photo as requirement when opening WO. Automatically documents equipment condition.

items.title: Imported parts control
items.text: Register orders with tracking code. Alert when part is expected to arrive.

items.title: Abandonment term
items.text: After configurable deadline, system generates term automatically. Legal protection for disposal.

items.title: Status via WhatsApp
items.text: Customer receives automatic updates. Quote approved, part arrived, ready for pickup.

items.title: Service catalog
items.text: Standardized price table. Automatically calculates margin by service type.

items.title: Financial reports
items.text: See revenue by equipment type. Identify the most profitable services.

testimonial.quote: Before I had TVs piling up in the shop and couldn't do anything. Now with the automatic abandonment term, I have legal backing. And the intake photo saved me from several false complaints.
testimonial.name: Marcos Silva
testimonial.role: Electronics repair shop owner for 15 years

faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.subtitle: Get your questions answered before you start

items.question: Do I need to pay to use it?
items.answer: No! The free plan is real and has no time limit. You can use it forever with up to 30 photos/month. Our pricing is transparent and you don't need to talk to a salesperson.

items.question: How does the abandonment term work?
items.answer: You set the deadline (e.g., 90 days). When the equipment reaches that time without being picked up, the system automatically generates the abandonment term with all legal documentation.

items.question: Can I require intake photos?
items.answer: Yes! You configure whether the photo is mandatory or optional. With mandatory photo, it's not possible to open a WO without documenting the equipment condition.

items.question: Does it work for tracking imported parts?
items.answer: Yes! You register the order with tracking code and expected date. The system alerts when the part should arrive, making it easy to follow up with the customer.

items.question: What if I need help?
items.answer: We have email support and complete documentation. We respond within 24 business hours. Our team knows the daily routine of electronics repair shops.

download.title: Download now and
download.text: Available for iOS and Android. Start free!

contact.title: Need
contact.subtitle: Our team is ready to assist you
